mapper.select: SELECT id,nickname,gender,avatar_url,sign, (SELECT count(1) FROM user_follow WHERE follower_id = #{currentId} AND following_id = u.id AND status=1) currentIdIsFollow FROM `user` u RIGHT JOIN (SELECT following_id,update_time FROM `user_follow` WHERE follower_id = #{id} AND status=1) t ON u.id = t.following_id ORDER BY t.update_time DESC
